data.title: Google wants its AI to disappear in your clothes
data.text: The latest update is the clearest depiction of how Google is thinking of "ambient computing," which the company describes as using computing without feeling tied to a physical phone.

data.title: Google CEO and Ivanka Trump announce plan to teach workers tech skills
data.text: The search giant signed the White House's "Pledge to America's Workers."

data.title: Google CEO teams up with Ivanka Trump to create more jobs
data.text: FOX Business’s Hillary Vaughn on Google CEO Sundar Pichai and Ivanka Trump teaming up to create more IT jobs.

data.title: First look: Inside Google Cloud’s new Seattle campus — right across the street from Amazon
data.text: Google and Amazon are getting cozy in downtown Seattle.

data.title: 3 FANG Stocks to Buy Into Earnings
data.text: Wall Street is reeling from headlines. But this is the time to construct a shopping list including the FANG stocks to buy into earnings.

data.title: Ivanka Trump and Google's CEO announce a tech job training initiative
data.text: The announcement comes as Google and others face mounting antitrust probes into their businesses.

data.title: Governments won’t be able to stop Facebook and Google from abusive tracking on smartphones — but Apple could
data.text: Another day, another headline saying Alphabet’s Google and Facebook are being investigated for allegedly breaking privacy laws and engaging in anti-trust behavior.

data.title: Google adds new features to Shopping page, including styling help
data.text: Google Shopping has added new features including the ability to purchase directly from the Shopping page, track pricing for the best deal, and styling help using Google Lens.

data.title: New pictures of Google's phones leak before its big hardware event this month
data.text: New images of Google's Pixel 4 and Pixel 4 XL phones were published ahead of the company's big hardware event on Oct. 15.

data.title: Final Trades: GOOGL, DAL, XLP & ULTA
data.text: The "Fast Money" traders share their final trades of the day including GOOGL, DAL and more.

data.title: Redesigned Google Shopping goes live, with price tracking, Google Lens for outfits and more
data.text: Google Shopping is getting a redesign with several new features, including options to shop local stores, track prices and even find style inspiration through Google Lens. Already, Google Lens’ smart image recognition technology can help identify objects, translate text, and find similar items.
